title: #264: Narcos (@LuisaDiezNuts)
itunes:title: Narcos with Luisa Diez
description: Luisa Diez came over to talk about her father's involvement in the Escobar drug cartel in Colombia. She grew up in the middle of it all with her father who was pretty much CFO of Escobar's cartel. It was a really interesting discussion about her family and about the state of the drug trade in the 1980s.
